query.name: get_all_assets
query.sql:
SELECT uplink_location_space_plan.location_address_id, uplink_equipment.*, uplink_equipment_type.name, uplink_equipment_type_images.equipment_type_image_id, uplink_location_equipment_position.*, uplink_location_equipment.location_address_id, (uplink_location_address.name) as location_address_name, uplink_equipment_type_container.equipment_type_container_id
FROM (uplink_location_space_plan, uplink_equipment, uplink_equipment_type, uplink_location_equipment, uplink_location_equipment_position, uplink_location_address, uplink_equipment_type_images)
LEFT JOIN uplink_equipment_type_container ON (uplink_equipment_type_container.equipment_type_id=uplink_equipment_type.equipment_type_id)
WHERE uplink_equipment.deletion_datetime > ? AND uplink_equipment.account_id = ? AND uplink_equipment.equipment_type_id=uplink_equipment_type.equipment_type_id AND uplink_equipment.equipment_id=uplink_location_equipment.equipment_id AND uplink_location_equipment.location_address_id=uplink_location_address.location_address_id AND uplink_location_address.deletion_datetime > ? AND uplink_location_space_plan.location_space_plan_id=? AND uplink_location_equipment.location_address_id=? AND uplink_location_address.location_address_id=uplink_location_space_plan.location_address_id AND uplink_location_equipment_position.location_equipment_id=uplink_location_equipment.location_equipment_id AND uplink_location_equipment_position.deletion_datetime > ? AND uplink_equipment_type_images.equipment_type_id=uplink_equipment.equipment_type_id AND uplink_equipment_type_images.default_image='1' AND uplink_equipment_type_images.deletion_datetime > ? AND uplink_location_address.account_id=? AND uplink_location_equipment.account_id=? AND uplink_location_equipment_position.account_id=? AND uplink_location_space_plan.account_id=? AND uplink_equipment_type.account_id=?
GROUP BY equipment_id
